name: DubSlider: Warped Dubstep
description:
Let's slide through the dubstep funnel!

This is an indie rhythm-based musical arcade game, but with unique game mechanics.
You have to control the dub-trap and catch the rhythm orbs on your way. More orbs means more score points. That's it.

Please rate and feel free to leave feedback. This really motivates to improve the game for you,
add more music tracks, tunnel visuals, game modes, achievements and even more.

***If you are experiencing performance problems on your device, please tell us about. We are fighting with this issue.***

Hope you enjoy DubSlider.

No In-App purchases ever for all of our games!

The DubSlider 1.2 will be released soon. You can see the preview video from FictionWare site.
